title: What?
description: What? tells the story of Curious Cat, who is tired of eating the same thing for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The questions he asks will be familiar to early readers. The repetitive sentence pattern is supported by engaging illustrations.
meta: breakfast, curious, dinner, fish, lunch, pizza, please, snack
Blend Phonemes : Blend onset and rime
Capitalization and Punctuation : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
